Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Mangham -- 1% S&U - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
TOWN OF MANGHAM PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR RENEWAL OF A LEVY OF A ONE PERCENT (1%) SALES AND USE TAX, TO BE DEDICATED AND USED FOR ANY LAWFUL CORPORATE PURPOSE OF THE TOWN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Mangham of the Parish of Richland State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a one percent (1%) sales and use tax in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016 for any lawful purpose?
